name: 5Min Separate Bricks
description:
5Min Separate Bricks is a brick breaker made as part of the Gdevelop Game Jam #3. The goal is simple: pass the levels by breaking the bricks... but watch out for the separation!

LILUO -> https://liluo.io/rsdesign/5-min-separate-bricks

Features: one paddle, one ball, 20 levels made of famous characters and 4 bonuses that are triggered automatically:

  • Shoot anything that moves for a few seconds,
  • Grant a shield for a few seconds,
  •  Restore life for a short time,
  •  The paddle gains in width but becomes more vulnerable.

Each brick, large  or small , destroyed with the ball , bullets  or paddle earns points.

But beware of the traps that cause you to lose life:

  • Each small brick hit by the ball shoots a bullet  towards the racket,
  • Each bullet  that hits the paddle causes a few life points to be lost ,
  • The game isn't over when the ball hits the bottom of the screen.

5Min Separate Bricks is fully playable on PC or Mobile.
